resources.string: NeoDash created by ITV Lab. Open source on GitHub. Based on Muzei and DashClock.
NeoDash is a screensaver which lets users customize the wallpaper and widgets that are displayed.\nWallpaper sources and extensions can be added through third-party applications.

NeoDash created by ITV Lab. Open source on GitHub: http://github.com/itvlab/neodash.
Based on Muzei and DashClock.

https://github.com/romannurik/dashclock
https://github.com/romannurik/muzei

Both apps are licensed under the Apache License 2.0
This app won\'t work on your OS version.
Here you can have some data.
